tool_description: Delivers push notifications to mobile devices through platform-specific services (APNs for iOS, FCM for Android).

customer_id.description: Customer identifier for device token lookup

error_messages: Customer not found: No device tokens found for the specified customer_id
Invalid payload: Notification payload is not valid JSON format
Invalid platform: Platform must be one of [ios, android]
Invalid priority: Priority must be one of [low, normal, high]
Delivery failed: Push notification could not be delivered to device
Token expired: Device token has expired and needs to be refreshed
usage: Provide customer_id, notification_payload, and target platform. Optionally set priority. The tool delivers the push notification to registered devices.

delivery_id.description: Unique identifier for this push notification delivery

devices_targeted.description: Number of devices that received the notification

delivery_status.description: Overall delivery status: sent, failed, partial

failed_devices.description: Number of devices where delivery failed
